episode: This past Christmas I was feeling very nostalgic and sentimental. The years have just seemingly flown by.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: hello

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: How's it going?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: good. How are you?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm good, thanks. What's on your mind?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: This past Christmas I was feeling very nostalgic and sentimental. The years have just seemingly flown by.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It can be crazy how fast time passes, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It really is. The older I get, the quicker time flies

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like the years just blend together after a while.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Absolutely. The days turn into weeks, the weeks turn into months, and the months turn into years

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Before you know it, a decade is gone.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yup. You gotta appreciate every day

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Make the most of it while you can.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. You never know when your time may come

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Life's unpredictable that way.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes it is

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Guess that's what makes it so precious.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is. It makes you appreciate even the small things in life

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: The little things add up, don't they?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Make life richer somehow.
